Name: Copper Stormforge
Traits: Dwarven Resilience. The copper stormforge has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage. Keen Hearing and Sight. Copper has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
Actions: Multiattack. Copper makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks. Shortsword. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. Longbow. Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
